imdb.title: Sengoku Otome: Momoiro Paradokkusu
imdb.plot: Yoshino Hide, known as Hideyoshi to her friends, is a typical middle-school student, until she's thrown into another world. This new world is just like the Sengoku period of Japan, except one big difference: There are no men.

episodes.title: Transfer Maiden
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Confused Maiden
episodes.plot: This new world in which Hideyoshi finds herself is exactly like the Warring States era....except there are only women!

episodes.title: Sky Maiden
episodes.plot: Imagawa Yoshimoto is under attack by Nobunaga! Later, Nobunaga challenges Yoshimoto!

episodes.title: Confrontation Maiden
episodes.plot: Uesugi and Takeda continue their fight over the armor. Meanwhile, Hideyoshi laments that her cell phone is broken!

episodes.title: Ghost Story Maiden
episodes.plot: Hideyoshi goes hawk hunting with the rest of the group, but when they go after their prey they get more than they bargained for.

episodes.title: Memory Maiden
episodes.plot: As the downpour continues, each girl reflects on her past.

episodes.title: Drama Maiden
episodes.plot: Hideyoshi teaches the rest of the girls what a play is and how to perform it! As soon as everyone is up to speed, the competition begins for a leading role!

episodes.title: Fever Maiden
episodes.plot: Nobunaga and Hideyoshi set out to recover the remaining pieces of armor, and Nobunaga falls victim to an ugly rumor. Later, Hideyoshi becomes ill.

episodes.title: Saigoku Maiden
episodes.plot: When Hideyoshi is taken captive, Nobunaga sets out to save her and is overcome by a violent rage.

episodes.title: Double Suicide Maiden
episodes.plot: Finally, all the pieces of armor are recovered! Hideyoshi's history book reveals a grim future for Nobunaga.

episodes.title: Sunshine Maiden
episodes.plot: The fate of the battle girls is called into question one last time when they find someone's armor buried in the ruins of the castle.
